thread.section_title: Peking International Youth Hostel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great little place - difficult to find!
thread.title_full: Great little place - difficult to find! - Review of Peking International Youth Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: nixgreen
title: Great little place - difficult to find!
text:
First and foremost I have to say that it is vital that you have the name and address and probably a map for this hostel printed out before you try to find it as it is down a little pedestrian alleyway so your taxi driver will not be able to take you to the front door address. Such was the turmoil of my friend and I having arrived in China for our first visit in -13C temperature, being unable to find our digs.
Once there, the place is lovely, charming and comfortable - and brilliantly located in the old part of Beijing where there are lots of cute places to visit and in walking distance to many attractions.
As stated in there reviews, this was not a particularly sociable hostel, I was travelling with friends so we were fine with that.
The people working there were also considerate and helpful, one even letting me use her local credit card to book ballet tickets.
